description: Photos: Controversial Kaepernick comes to Atlanta, faces Falcons
title: Photos: Controversial Kaepernick comes to Atlanta, faces Falcons
title_page: Photos: Controversial Kaepernick comes to Atlanta, faces Falcons
text:
1 / 27
John Bazemore/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) and San Francisco 49ers outside linebacker Eli Harold (58) kneel during the playing of the National anthem before the first half of an NFL football game between the Atlanta Falcons and the San Francisco 49ers, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Kaepernick completed 20 of 33 passes for 183 yards with two TDs and no interceptions. He had 21 yards rushing. (AP Photo/John Bazemore)
2 / 27
John Bazemore/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick, left, Atlanta Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan speak after an NFL football game, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. The Atlanta Falcons won 41-13. (AP Photo/John Bazemore)
3 / 27
Butch Dill/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick walks off the turf after an NFL football game against the Atlanta Falcons, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. The Atlanta Falcons won 41-13. (AP Photo/Butch Dill)
4 / 27
John Bazemore/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) speaks with Atlanta Falcons wide receiver Julio Jones after an NFL football game, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. The Atlanta Falcons won 41-13.(AP Photo/John Bazemore)
5 / 27
John Bazemore/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) runs out of the pocket against the Atlanta Falcons during the first half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/John Bazemore)
6 / 27
Butch Dill/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) embraces San Francisco 49ers defensive end Quinton Dial (92) before the first half of an NFL football game between the Atlanta Falcons and the San Francisco 49ers, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/Butch Dill)
7 / 27
Scott Cunningham/Getty Images ATLANTA, GA - DECEMBER 18: Colin Kaepernick #7 of the San Francisco 49ers waits for the snap during the first half against the Atlanta Falcons at the Georgia Dome on December 18, 2016 in Atlanta, Georgia. (Photo by Scott Cunningham/Getty Images)
8 / 27
Butch Dill/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick enters the Georgia Dome with team mates before the first half of an NFL football game between the Atlanta Falcons and the San Francisco 49ers, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/Butch Dill)
9 / 27
Butch Dill/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick walks off the turf after an NFL football game against the Atlanta Falcons, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. The Atlanta Falcons won 41-13. (AP Photo/Butch Dill)
10 / 27
Butch Dill/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick warms up before the first half of an NFL football game between the Atlanta Falcons and the San Francisco 49ers, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/Butch Dill)
11 / 27
Butch Dill/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick warms up before the first half of an NFL football game between the Atlanta Falcons and the San Francisco 49ers, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/Butch Dill)
12 / 27
John Bazemore/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick warms up before the first half of an NFL football game between the Atlanta Falcons and the San Francisco 49ers, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/John Bazemore)
13 / 27
Butch Dill/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) and San Francisco 49ers quarterback Christian Ponder (15) run on the turf before the first half of an NFL football game between the Atlanta Falcons and the San Francisco 49ers, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/Butch Dill)
14 / 27
John Bazemore/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) prepares to hand off the ball to San Francisco 49ers wide receiver Quinton Patton (11) against the Atlanta Falcons during the first half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/John Bazemore)
15 / 27
John Bazemore/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) throws the ball of the pocket against the Atlanta Falcons during the first half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/John Bazemore)
16 / 27
Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images ATLANTA, GA - DECEMBER 18: Colin Kaepernick #7 of the San Francisco 49ers celebrates a touchdown with Rod Streater #81 during the first half against the Atlanta Falcons at the Georgia Dome on December 18, 2016 in Atlanta, Georgia. (Photo by Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images)
17 / 27
Scott Cunningham/Getty Images ATLANTA, GA - DECEMBER 18: Colin Kaepernick #7 of the San Francisco 49ers runs the ball during the first half against the Atlanta Falcons at the Georgia Dome on December 18, 2016 in Atlanta, Georgia. (Photo by Scott Cunningham/Getty Images)
18 / 27
ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons Vic Beasley Jr. tackles 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick on third down taking him out of bounds on a pass rush and forcing the punt during the second quarter in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com
19 / 27
Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images ATLANTA, GA - DECEMBER 18: Colin Kaepernick #7 of the San Francisco 49ers passes under pressure during the first half against the Atlanta Falcons at the Georgia Dome on December 18, 2016 in Atlanta, Georgia. (Photo by Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images)
20 / 27
Butch Dill/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick walks off the turf after an NFL football game against the Atlanta Falcons, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. The Atlanta Falcons won 41-13. (AP Photo/Butch Dill)
21 / 27
Scott Cunningham/Getty Images ATLANTA, GA - DECEMBER 18: Colin Kaepernick #7 of the San Francisco 49ers looks on from the sidelines during the second half against the Atlanta Falcons at the Georgia Dome on December 18, 2016 in Atlanta, Georgia. (Photo by Scott Cunningham/Getty Images)
22 / 27
Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images ATLANTA, GA - DECEMBER 18: Colin Kaepernick #7 of the San Francisco 49ers signals to his offense during the first half against the Atlanta Falcons at the Georgia Dome on December 18, 2016 in Atlanta, Georgia. (Photo by Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images)
23 / 27
Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images ATLANTA, GA - DECEMBER 18: Colin Kaepernick #7 of the San Francisco 49ers and Eli Harold #58 kneel during the National Anthem prior to the game against the Atlanta Falcons at the Georgia Dome on December 18, 2016 in Atlanta, Georgia. (Photo by Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images)
24 / 27
John Bazemore/AP San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) falls to the turf ahead of Atlanta Falcons linebacker LaRoy Reynolds (53) during the second half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. The Atlanta Falcons won 41-13. (AP Photo/John Bazemore)
25 / 27
Butch Dill/AP Atlanta Falcons defensive tackle Ra'Shede Hageman (77) sacks San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) during the second half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/Butch Dill)
26 / 27
